Package whz.informatik.coffeeshop.shop.service

Interface ShoppingCartService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShoppingCartServiceImpl

    public interface ShoppingCartService
    Service-Interface to provide functionality to controllers to handle ShoppingCart-Persistence

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAllItemsToCart​(long shoppingCartId, java.util.Collection<Item> items)
      add given collection of items to the shoppingCart with the given id
      void addAllItemsToCart​(ShoppingCart shoppingCart, java.util.Collection<Item> items)
      add given collection of items to the shoppingCart
      void clearCart​(long shoppingCartId)
      clear shoppingCart (remove all items)
      void createAndAddItemToCart​(ShoppingCart shoppingCart, long productId, int amount)
      add an item to the given shoppingCart if the product of the given item is already contained, the amount will be added instead of creating a new item
      Item createItem​(long productId, int amount)
      create new item and save it in the database
      ShoppingCart createShoppingCartForCustomer​(Customer customer)
      create new ShoppingCart for given customer and persist it in the database

      find shoppingCart with given Id
      java.util.Optional<ShoppingCartDTO> getShoppingCartDTOById​(long shoppingCartId)
      find shoppingCart with given id and create DTO for network usage
      java.util.List<ShoppingCart> getShoppingCartsByCustomer​(Customer customer)
      find all shoppingCarts of given customer
      java.util.List<ShoppingCart> getShoppingCartsByCustomerId​(long customerId)

      get all shoppingcarts of the given customer and create DTOs for network usage
      java.util.List<ShoppingCartDTO> getShoppingCartsDTOByCustomerId​(long customerId)
      get all shoppingCarts of the customer with the given id and create DTOs for network usage
      ShoppingCart update​(ShoppingCart shoppingCart)
      persist the given shoppingCart in the database
